import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../assets/css/register_style.css';/**

 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{// State variables for storing form input values
const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();/**
     * Handles form submission.
     * Prevents default form behavior, sends a POST request to the registration API,
     * and navigates the user to the home page on success.
     */const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();// Sends POST request to the server to register a new user
axios.post('/api/register/',{username,password,email}).then(response=>{// On success, store the authentication token in local storage
localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.access);// Navigate to the home page after successful registration
navigate('/');}).catch(error=>console.error(error));// Logs any errors encountered during the request
